name: secondo
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the second part of a piece of music that is being performed: The tenor led the first part of the concert, and the baritone led the secondo. The subdued opener set the mood, leading to a lively secondo that showed off the brass section.
the performer of a piano duet (= two people playing the piano at the same time) who plays the lower notes: Max played the high end of the duet while his brother played the secondo.
